pages.text: Once you've visited The Nether to get blast furnace ingredients, you'll need to construct a Blast Furnace and fuel it with Charcoal or Coal Coke (from your Coke Oven). Steel is a necessary ingredient, but after this point you can move into Mekanism happily!

pages.title: Into the Steel Age
pages.text: Yep, that's a steel for ya', now it's about what you do with it!
